hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Hisham with the same chain of transmitters. And in the hadith transmitted by Abu Usama the words are:" She did not make any will," as it has been reported by Ibn Bishr, but it was not reported by the rest of the narrators

chapter.ara-name: باب وُصُولِ ثَوَابِ الصَّدَقَةِ عَنِ الْمَيِّتِ، إِلَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: Charity given on behalf of the deceased will reach him
